definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: ? Am 3:12 [[עָָרֶשׂ]] ´[[וּבִד]]; punct. & mng. dub.: all ancient Vrss [[דַּמֶּשֶׂק]], and so Pusey Hoffm:ZAW iii. 102 (‘ in Damascus on a couch ’) al., yet this hardly suitable in context; Thes Hi Ew Baur Ke Gunning RV al. follow MT, & render damask, silk, etc. (Ar. dimaq4un, connex. with city [[דַּמֶּשֶׂק]] (Ar. dima4qu) disputed; acc. to Frä:40. 288 Ar. dimaq4un is by metath. from miqda4un, & this a loan-word from Syr. myt.ks0, & this from Gk. me/taca (Old Lat. metaxa)).
